titleInfo.title: Peregrino Environmental Monitoring Calcareous Algae Project Image Data

mods.abstract:
This data was recorded during a calcareous algae stress experiment. Images were taken every week for 9 weeks. Details of the experiment are described in Figueiredo, et al. "The effect of sediment mimicking drill cuttings on deep water rhodoliths in a flow-through system: Experimental work and modeling." Marine pollution bulletin (2015).(http://dx.doi.org/10.1016/j.marpolbul.2015.04.040)
Contact information:
Frederico Tapajós de Souza Tâmega
<fredtamega@gmail.com>, Instituto Biodiversidade Marinha, 22.793-000, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil and Instituto de Estudos do Mar Almirante Paulo Moreira, 28.930-000, Arraial do Cabo, RJ, Brazil
Marcia Abreu de Oliveira Figueiredo
<marciafcreed@gmail.com>, Instituto de Pesquisa Jardim Botanico do Rio de Janeiro, CEP 22.460-030, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil and Instituto Biodiversidade Marinha, 22.793-000, Rio de Janeiro, RJ, Brazil
